Name: Cyclops
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with the Hammer of the Cyclops.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

Each time this model makes an attack in the Melee Combat step, if an unmodified wound roll of 5+ is scored, then double the Damage Characteristic of that attack. In addition, while a friendly LEGENDARY Formation is within 3" of this model then add 1 to the Damage Characteristic of weapons equipped by that LEGENDARY Formation.
